:	O

.	O

.	O

A	O

strategy	O
should	O
be	O

:	O

the	O
hoax	O

.	O

such	O

Terrorism	O
is	O
here	O
to	O
stay	O
,	O
whether	O

like	O
or	O
not	O
.	O

.	O

.	O

Intelligence	O
.	O

.	O

Many	O
people	O
start	O
describing	O
it	O
as	O
an	O
intelligence	O
failure	O
.	O

This	O

not	O

as	O
an	O
intelligence	O
failure	O
.	O

In	O

,	O

15	O

people	O

.	O

Even	O

like	O

and	O

--	O

far	O
less	O

not	O

.	O

.	O

.	O

There	O
are	O
many	O

targets	O
in	O
any	O
city	O
like	O
Mumbai	LOC_Event
,	O
London	LOC_Others
,	O
New	LOC_Others
York	LOC_Others
,	O
Tokyo	O
,	O
Paris	LOC_Others
.	O

The	O
success	O
of	O
intelligence	O
is	O
rarely	O
known	O
,	O
only	O
when	O
some	O
major	O

of	O
arms	O
or	O

is	O
made	O

of	O
it	O
.	O

Else	O
,	O
the	O
success	O
is	O
always	O

.	O

Similarly	O
,	O
successes	O
in	O
security	O
prevention	O
are	O
not	O
known	O
at	O
all	O
.	O

Only	O
the	O
breaches	O
are	O
known	O
.	O

.	O

.	O

In	O
TQM/QA	O
-LRB-	O
Total	O
Quality	O
Management/Quality	O
Analysis	O
-RRB-	O
terms	O
,	O
if	O
we	O
say	O
that	O
93	O
per	O
cent	O
of	O
probable	O
incidents	O
are	O

and	O
7	O
per	O
cent	O
leads	O
to	O
real	O
incidents	O
,	O
we	O
can	O
say	O
intelligence	O
has	O
three-sigma	O
quality	O
accuracy	O
.	O

.	O

.	O

This	O
7	O
per	O
cent	O
apparently	O
looks	O
quite	O
high	O
.	O

Four-sigma	O
intelligence	O
quality	O
will	O
make	O
it	O
99.4	O
per	O
cent	O
and	O
0.6	O
per	O
cent	O
.	O

I	O
believe	O
,	O
the	O
intelligence	O
quality	O
may	O
lie	O
somewhere	O
between	O
3.5	O
sigma	O
and	O
4	O
sigma	O
.	O

At	O
less	O
than	O
this	O
mark	O
,	O
we	O
would	O
have	O
seen	O
many	O
more	O
such	O
horrible	O
incidents	O
.	O

.	O

.	O

IT	O
infrastructure	O
could	O
be	O
the	O
next	O
target	O
.	O

.	O

If	O
the	O
methods	O
used	O
by	O
terrorist	O
since	O
1993	O
till	O
2006	O
are	O
analysed	O
,	O

can	O
see	O

trend	O
that	O
the	O
attacks	O
are	O
becoming	O
more	O

with	O
precisely	O
defined	O

.	O

The	O

of	O

in	O

revealed	O
that	O
terrorists	O
are	O

people	O
trained	O
in	O
engineering	O
,	O
science	O
,	O
medicine	O
and	O
management	O
.	O

.	O

.	O

A	O
lot	O
of	O

and	O

is	O
flowing	O
in	O
to	O
the	O
terror	O

.	O

It	O

that	O

least	O
the	O
planning	O
process	O
is	O
done	O
by	O
technical	O
and	O
managerial	O

minds	O
.	O

.	O

.	O

In	O
this	O
scenario	O
,	O
the	O
risk	O
is	O
very	O
high	O
that	O
IT	O
infrastructure	O
and	O
IT	O
assets	O
may	O
be	O
targetted	O
in	O
the	O
future	O
.	O

This	O
is	O
one	O
of	O
the	O
softest	O
targets	O
today	O
,	O
which	O
can	O
create	O
maximum	O
damage	O
.	O

.	O

.	O

Today	O
,	O
the	O
application	O
and	O
implementation	O
of	O
IT	O
controls	O
many	O
business	O
processes	O
of	O
social	O
and	O
national	O
strategic	O
importance	O
--	O
power	O
,	O
communication	O
,	O
railways	O
,	O
transport	O
,	O
oil	O
,	O
manufacturing	O
,	O
banking	O
,	O
services	O
,	O
government-business	O
,	O
etc.	O
.	O

The	O
security	O
of	O
these	O
IT	O
assets	O
and	O
IT	O
infrastructure	O
is	O
far	O
lower	O
compared	O
to	O
the	O
security	O
of	O
normal	O
physical	O
assets/infrastructure	O
.	O

Hackers	O
,	O
perpetrators	O
,	O
computer-criminals	O
easily	O
break	O
into	O
IT	O
assets	O
and	O
create	O
news	O
.	O

.	O

.	O

There	O
are	O
many	O
methods	O
available	O
for	O
terrorists	O
to	O
break	O
into	O
this	O
IT	O
infrastructure	O
/	O
IT	O
assets	O
.	O

I	O
can	O
discuss	O
a	O
number	O
of	O
these	O
.	O

But	O
the	O
irony	O
is	O
that	O
this	O
discussion	O
of	O
methods	O
apart	O
from	O
creating	O
awareness	O
among	O

,	O
will	O
also	O
help	O
terrorist	O
get	O
ideas	O
.	O

I	O
refrain	O
from	O
discussing	O
these	O
methods	O
as	O
a	O
better	O
and	O
socially	O
secure	O
option	O
.	O

.	O

.	O

Thus	O
,	O
it	O
is	O
the	O
duty	O
of	O
all	O
concerned	O
business-process	O
owners	O
,	O
whether	O
in	O
government	O
or	O
industry	O
or	O
utilities	O
,	O
to	O
ascertain	O
that	O

.	O

.	O

.	O

.	O

.	O

.	O

Security	O
is	O

.	O

.	O

.	O

.	O

.	O

lead	O
.	O

.	O

.	O

.	O

in	O

in	O
Maharashtra	LOC_Others

of	O
IEDs	O
.	O

The	O
rebels	O
,	O

as	O
Naxalites	O
,	O
have	O
been	O

and	O

poor	O
.	O

They	O
take	O

name	O
from	O
the	O
West	LOC_Others
Bengal	LOC_Others
village	O
of	O
Naxalbari	LOC_Others
where	O
the	O
movement	O
began	O
in	O
1967	O
.	O

fighters	O
were	O
inspired	O
by	O

,	O
DEC.	O
25	O

a	O

headquarters	O
here	O

were	O
killed	O
and	O
25	O
others	O
